Find out how to get the most out of them.</description>     <dc:date>2014-04-11T14:36:45Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/exams/three-ways-to-get-more-out-of-your-revision">     <title>Three ways to get more out of your revision</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/exams/three-ways-to-get-more-out-of-your-revision</link>     <description>You can make your revision more effective without spending extra hours on it. Read these tips to find out how.</description>     <dc:date>2014-04-08T15:33:19Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/exams/exam-re-marking-explained">     <title>Exam re-marking explained</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/exams/exam-re-marking-explained</link>     <description>Got a bad result you don't think you deserve? Don't despair - it's possible to get your results checked.</description>     <dc:date>2013-05-10T15:46:42Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/exams/do-you-have-lucky-exam-pants">     <title>Do you have lucky exam pants?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/exams/do-you-have-lucky-exam-pants</link>     <description>A survey shows that a third of students wear lucky pants to do their exams - but almost half say they don't do enough revision.</description>     <dc:date>2013-05-10T12:31:49Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/exams/four-tips-to-improve-your-exam-technique">     <title>Four tips to improve your exam technique</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/exams/four-tips-to-improve-your-exam-technique</link>     <description>Good exam technique helps to make sure your hard work gets recognized. Try these simple tips to get the best result you can.</description>     <dc:date>2013-03-07T17:35:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/exams/how-to-get-an-a-without-doing-the-exam">     <title>How to get an A without doing the exam</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/exams/how-to-get-an-a-without-doing-the-exam</link>     <description>Students in America managed to beat the system, using their exam's grading system to get top marks without even sitting the exam.</description>     <dc:date>2013-02-12T17:05:23Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/exams/different-types-of-exam">     <title>Different types of exam</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/exams/different-types-of-exam</link>     <description>Knowing the type of test you\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdre going to be taking can be as important as knowing the answers. Read on for our guide to the different types of exams you could sit \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd and the best ways to deal with them.</description>     <dc:date>2012-11-16T16:35:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/exams/is-exam-panic-good-for-your-results">     <title>Is exam panic good for your results?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/exams/is-exam-panic-good-for-your-results</link>     <description>The morning before an exam can be nerve-racking, but does the worry harm your results or help them?</description>     <dc:date>2012-10-12T12:29:46Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/exams/ever-felt-like-your-maths-exam-was-impossible">     <title>Ever felt like your maths exam was impossible?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/exams/ever-felt-like-your-maths-exam-was-impossible</link>     <description>The exam board OCR has apologized for setting a maths exam question that was impossible to answer. Over 6,000 students sat the AS-level paper on 26th...</description>     <dc:date>2011-06-03T14:30:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/exams/revise-or-improvise">     <title>Revise or improvise?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/exams/revise-or-improvise</link>     <description>A survey of how people study for exams shows that nearly 50% of young people will cram the night before. But is this the best way to study?</description>     <dc:date>2010-08-25T09:20:00Z</dc:date>   </item> </rdf:RDF>
